name: openclaw-web3-skills
description: Comprehensive Web3 skills: Ethereum, IPFS, and privacy technologies for OpenClaw agents
author: OpenClaw Community

skills.name: eth-readonly
skills.description: Read-only Ethereum blockchain queries — blocks, transactions, balances, contracts, logs

skills.name: eth-node
skills.description: Manage Ethereum execution client nodes — start, stop, sync status, peers, logs

skills.name: foundry
skills.description: Ethereum development with Foundry — build, test, deploy, and debug Solidity contracts

skills.name: seismic-foundry
skills.description: Develop, test, and deploy shielded contracts with sforge and scast

skills.name: seismic-reth
skills.description: Seismic-reth node — encrypted transactions, shielded storage, TEE operations

skills.name: ipfs-client
skills.description: Read-only IPFS queries — fetch files, inspect metadata, explore DAGs, resolve IPNS

skills.name: ipfs-server
skills.description: Full IPFS node operations — pin content, publish IPNS, manage peers, run gateways
